Module fi.tuni.monitor
Package fi.tuni.monitor.controllers

Class MainWindowController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.monitor.controllers.MainWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, PropertyChangeListener
Controller for the main window
Loads all other view and controllers

Implements the PropertyChangeListener for observer design pattern to receive broadcasts from the CoordinateSelectionModel
